pr_title: Fix broken links to aggregation javadoc

timeline.bodyText:
This link points to a non-existing page, removing extended will fix it.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            | {ref}/search-aggregations-metrics-extendedstats-aggregation.html[Extended Stats]                   | {agg-ref}/metrics/extended/ExtendedStatsAggregationBuilder.html[ExtendedStatsAggregationBuilder]  | {agg-ref}/AggregationBuilders.html#extendedStats-java.lang.String-[AggregationBuilders.extendedStats()]
          
          
            
            | {ref}/search-aggregations-metrics-extendedstats-aggregation.html[Extended Stats]                   | {agg-ref}/metrics/ExtendedStatsAggregationBuilder.html[ExtendedStatsAggregationBuilder]  | {agg-ref}/AggregationBuilders.html#extendedStats-java.lang.String-[AggregationBuilders.extendedStats()]

timeline.bodyText: The link of MovAvgPipelineAggregationBuilder is broken. I cannot find the appropriate aggregation in the package summary: https://snapshots.elastic.co/javadoc/org/elasticsearch/elasticsearch/8.0.0-SNAPSHOT/org/elasticsearch/search/aggregations/pipeline/package-summary.html
